@harmonygirl23 that's what NTR is at its core. It's very rare for NTR to be emotional because that would require the reader to empathizes with the netori and often becomes a netori. The netori in Netorare have to be a force of nature rather than a character that steal the female heroine and return her to nature as messed up as that sounds. I'd recommend 350661 as it's a flip on the good guy protagonist
